newsitem.title: USA: ACT Teleconferencing names Thomson COO.
newsitem.headline: ACT Teleconferencing names Thomson COO.

text.p: ACT Teleconferencing Inc said Thursday it named Gavin Thomson as vice president, finance and planning, and chief financial officer.
He succeeds Pamela Van Eeckhout, who resigned in December, it said.

Since 1994, Thomson has served as managing director of TEK Corp, an electronics company based in South Africa. He was previously TEK's chief financial officer and worked with other companies within a group owned by Sankorp, the investment arm of Sanlam, a South African insurance conglomerate.
ACT provides audio, video and data teleconferencing products and services. The company also has offices in London, Amsterdam and Brussels.
